lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know that the little I have to spare can make a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working to make the world a little better and life a little easier.

lender.name: Ticia
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help those who are trying to improve their lives and the world around them.
lender.occupational_info: I write and design puzzles of all types, including cryptic crosswords, mazes, and word searches. I have written two "For Dummies" puzzle books.

lender.name: Cal
lender.loan_because: I hope to even the playing field for those living in poverty. No one chooses to struggle financially, and I wish that more people were provided other opportunities to escape.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: it is good to spread the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell stocks and currency. I try to make money doing it so that I can then spread the wealth.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world, one person at a time....I believe that we can all make a difference. Jesus has blessed me and my family and I want to bless others. www.bethanywilliams.org
lender.occupational_info: I am a healthcare executive working for a healthcare technology company, speaking on women in business and changing the world one life at a time.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: we can make a difference in the world we just need to take action
lender.occupational_info: I help computers talk to each other and protect the information they share

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.occupation: Mobile pre-school asst. teacher, office asst.
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to better his or her life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mobile pre-school program designed for families who can't afford to send their children to pre-school. I also work for a cosmetic dentistry office that matches survivors of domestic violence with dentists who agree to fix the survivor's teeth for free.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: Vee
lender.loan_because: it is important to help others.

lender.name: becca
lender.loan_because: it amazes me how much can be done with so little. Also, I think everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because:
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Ralph Waldo Emerson

lender.name: Althea
lender.loan_because: God has filled my life with so many blessings and to share the abundance of my life with others in ways that will help them to enrich their lives, is how He wants us to live.
lender.occupational_info: Constantly searching for ways to be of service to others including animals. I have a deep passion and love for animals, most especially dogs. They love so unconditionally and that is what I am striving to do with God's guidance and strength. To love unconditionally and see others only as my brothers and sisters that may need my help.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I like to help others. Also, I try to spend what little I make on something positive instead of wasting it on a big screen flat panel TV or a fancy car. I feel I'm always trying to make up for some of the stupid things many people in my country do and make many sacrifices to make up for their lack of.
lender.occupational_info:
I grew up working with my Grandfather at a very early age (about 7) drilling water well in Tennessee. I also worked on my Aunt and Uncle's berry farm from time to time. This is something not very common in the U.S. anymore sadly.
In my adult life, I have been a member of the U.S. military in various forms from an aircraft mechanic to a trumpet player. I have been deployed to Iraq and got to work closely with Iraqis and third country nationals.
These days I am a university student studying Geology and work as a Meteorologist for the Air National Guard part-time. I do also make a little playing trumpet here and there.

lender.name: Worldly Women
lender.occupation: A Group of Wellesley grads & friends
lender.loan_because: as a group we can have a greater effect!
lender.occupational_info: We are made up of women working in a wide range of fields with a common interest in helping women across the globe.

lender.name: Kyle & Becky
lender.loan_because: Security propagates peace.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others physically and relationally.

lender.name: Sam
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the law in the hopes of one day being able to help people while at work.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: The best way I can show my gratitude for my lifes' blessings is to give something back and make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a quality program manager. That means I work wikth a team of people to evaluate processes and find ways to make them and the people doing the work more efficient.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to make a living. I have two sons and am thankful that I have the education and opportunity to give my sons the best. I hope that by sharing what my sons and I have that another family will be as blessed as we are.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to F1 visa students from around the world. Every major continent is represented in my classroom. I love my job because I can learn as much as I teach.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I have been in small business myself and know how hard it is to get started in the early days. I have also travelled extensively in Asia and have seen how hard people work to improve their lives and the lives of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help people of all ages who have dropped out of school, get qualifications and go onto to university, employment or better jobs. I also publicise the work of TAFE on the North Coast of NSW.

lender.name: Javelin
lender.loan_because: I want to be involved in the world. I hope to be a contributor as much as I can, and not to only be a consumer of resources.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people and adults ballet and modern dance technique. I also choreograph staged performances.

lender.name: Intl Frontier Fund
lender.occupational_info:
The International Frontier Fund is a small scale private benevolent organisation.
The mission of the Fund is to expand learning, employment & business opportunities for people all over the world to enrich their lives.
The Fund advances this mission through a system of grants, scholarships & loans.
The Fund is currently active in Afghanistan, Australia, Bolivia, Cambodia, D.R. Congo, El Salvador, Ghana, Mali, Mexico, Paraguay, Peru & Uganda.

lender.name: Jason and Nicole
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help and I'm in a position to help.

If you believe a small contribution has the potential to make a difference please get involved and make your first donation today. http://tha.tc/k8H9bn

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of microcredit with large scale development projects because only the two together can work. I can only effect the small side, and therefore that is why I donate.

lender.name: maria gabriella
lender.loan_because: because is wonderfull

lender.name: Angelia
lender.loan_because:
I take it as a form of forced savings as well as knowing that the amount that I loaned to others will help somebody who is genuinely in need of some help.
I have been through that phase before whereby I was in debt of close to $25k and I was desperately looking for someone or various others to loan me the money. I met numerous rejections and some friends even went MIA when they heard of my debt! Luckily for me, I avoided legal actions taken against me because of the kind souls of many who had pooled the money together to help me out.
Thus, I would also like to extend that kind of help to someone who is in need and knowing that I had helped someone out in their desperate times warms my heart. Afterall one good turn deserves another. Pass the kindness on.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: I feel nice to help people to help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: I purify proteins from human blood so that doctors can determine certain things about thier patients before they operate on them.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a school of 1900 students. It is a close community and I love working with teachers and students. I learn something new everyday.

lender.loan_because: I have been loaned to.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I believe people are more successful when they take ownership of their future, and that a loan can improve their lives much more than a handout. When people have to invest their own hard work and talent in order to achieve a goal, they will value their success more highly.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an ESL teacher. I currently go to school and volunteer teaching English to adult immigrants from Mexico and Guatemala.

lender.occupational_info: I help make people's buisnesses more profitable.

lender.name: Valerie Curcuro
lender.loan_because: It is not good enough to say to someone, "I wish you success" without actually giving them the helping hand they need.
lender.occupational_info: Life Coaching provides the support, structure and accountability that keeps people on track to realizing their dreams and aspirations. I restore confidence when life has handed out a challenge; loss of job, loss of significant relationship, loss of direction. Life Coaching... because a good life isn't lived by accident

lender.name: Oriental Blush
lender.loan_because: I have just begun the journey of starting a small business and would like to help others, less fortunate than myself, have the opportunity to do the same thing. It's lovely to think that I am helping people to be independent and able to support themselves, their families and their community. I plan on donating to Kiva a percentage of all direct sales from my first product which I am about to launch soon.
lender.occupational_info: My company, Oriental Blush, specialises in products mainly for women. The philosophy of Oriental Blush is: Just because something is practical, it doesn't mean it can't also be beautiful.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I am looking for ways to help others improve their quality of life. The balance of wealth around the globe is unequal and I feel it should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: through education, encouragement and and empowerment I help people determine their risks for HIV and assist them in reducing those risks.
